name: Hikidashi Aita
storyline: There is a room inside your iPhone. Komonoes will come and visit you there. With "Hikidashi Aita" you can play with komonoes. Put a cushion in the room, with some smell, and watch komonoes curiously approach the smell. Use a fan to deliver the smell. And send lots of love until eventually the komonoes become your friends! Put the smell on the cusion to attract the komonoes. With different smell, different komonoes will appear. There are some rare kinds too... Use the fan, hit the hearts! The smell will attract the komonoes. When a comonoes is seen, quickly hit the hearts which appear on top of the cup. This way, you can show your love and their guard will be eased. Take your time, they will soon stay longer. Once the komonoes come closer to you, stroke them. All the komonoes are cautious to start with, but with time and effort, they will soon demand for a pat or two! Give them as much love as possible!
